notes: Homebrew 3E→5E conversions for armor & shield properties.
Daily refresh = once per dawn. 5E timing (Action/Bonus/Reaction).
Key-collision note: this set includes 'hb_animate_shield' (renamed from the generic 'animate_shield' to avoid conflict with the official XPHB version).
appliesTo values are restricted to 'armor' and/or 'shield'.

variants.name: Animate Shield
entries: While holding this shield, you can use a Bonus Action to cause it to animate and hover in your space, protecting you as if you were wielding it and leaving your hands free for 1 minute. You can use a Bonus Action to end the effect early; it also ends if you die or become Incapacitated. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

variants.name: Blurring
entries: Bonus Action: Your body becomes blurred; attackers that rely on sight have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. Lasts untill the end of your next turn. 3/day.

variants.name: Buoyant
entries: No swim penalties; Advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to swim.

textByKind.armor: Advantage on Athletics (Swim); armor imposes no extra penalties while swimming.

variants.name: Called
entries: Action: summon the item from anywhere on the same plane. Armor appears worn if you aren’t wearing other armor; shield appears in hand. Only after you have worn/used the item.

variants.name: Commander
entries: Advantage on Persuasion checks; allies of your choice within 30 ft gain +1 to all saving throws while they can see or hear you; you have Disadvantage on Stealth checks.

variants.name: Daylight
entries: Bonus Action to emit *daylight* up to 30 minutes per dawn; toggle as a Bonus Action.

textByKind.armor: Emit *daylight* up to 30 minutes per dawn; toggle BA.
textByKind.shield: Emit *daylight* up to 30 minutes per dawn; toggle BA.

variants.name: Death Ward
entries: Reaction to gain *death ward* vs a single effect; 1/day.

variants.name: Deepdweller
entries: Water breathing; immunity to frigid-water cold and crushing pressure; no swim penalties; simple communication with aquatic speakers; double underwater vision range.

variants.name: Dragondodger
entries: While in light armor, you have Evasion against breath weapons (Dex save for half → success = no damage).

variants.name: Energy Shroud
entries: Bonus Action: for 1 minute, any creature that hits you in melee takes 2d6 {OPTION} damage. 3/day.

variants.name: Energy Immunity
entries: Reaction: gain immunity to {OPTION} damage for 1 minute. 3/day.

variants.name: Fearsome
entries: Bonus Action: 20-ft aura; creatures of your choice must succeed on a Wisdom save or be Frightened for 1 minute (save ends). On success, Frightened until end of next turn. 3/day.

variants.name: Freedom
entries: bonus or reaction: cast freedom of movement breaking free of all snares, holds, grapples, paralasis and any other effects that hinder your movemenht. last for 1 round 3/day  .

variants.name: Ghost Ward
entries: Incorporeal attacks don’t ignore your armor/shield; you gain a +1 bonus to AC against such attacks.

variants.name: Hammerblock
entries: Resistance to bludgeoning damage from weapon attacks while worn or wielded.

variants.name: Spearblock
entries: Resistance to piercing damage from weapon attacks while worn or wielded.

variants.name: Healing
entries: Bonus Action: regain 2d8+5 HP once per dawn. If you would drop to 0 HP, drop to 1 and immediately gain the healing if available.

variants.name: Healing, Greater
entries: Bonus Action: regain 3d8+15 HP, 2/day. May trigger when you’d drop to 0 HP to drop to 1 HP and heal immediately.

variants.name: Heartening
entries: When you take damage, you can use your Reaction to gain 10 temporary hit points for up to 5 minutes. Uses 2/day.

variants.name: Vaulting
entries: increase jump distance by 5 feet and Ignore first 60 ft of falling damage; you always land on your feet.

variants.name: Linked
entries: Action: form a 1-hour *Rary’s telepathic bond* among known wearers within 10 miles. 3/day.

variants.name: Magic-Eating
entries: On a successful save against a spell that targets only you, regain hit points equal to five times the spell’s level (minimum 5).

variants.name: Masking
entries: Constant *nondetection*; divinations that target you require a DC 25 spellcasting ability check.

variants.name: Menacing
entries: Action: all creatures within 30 ft (with fewer HD/levels) makes a Wis save (DC 8 + prof + Cha) or is Frightened for 5 rounds. 3/day.

variants.name: Mindarmor
entries: When forced to make a Wisdom saving throw vs (charm/fear/mind-affecting), you can give yourself Advantage and +2 to the roll. 3/day.

variants.name: Mobility
entries: Your movement is increaded by 5 feet and If wearing light or no armor, opportunity attacks against you are made with Disadvantage.

variants.name: Prismatic Aegis
entries: Reaction: gain Resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder until end of your next turn. When the armor resists damage this way, it sheds bright light 30 ft (dim +30 ft) for rounds equal to damage prevented (max 10).

variants.name: Ranged Shield
entries: Throw the shield (30/90). Light shields 1d6 slashing; heavy shields 1d8; add Str mod and enhancement to damage. Returns just before your next turn; you don’t gain its AC while away.

variants.name: Retaliation
entries: When a single melee attack against you deals more then Your (your Character lVl X 3) damage to you, as a reaction you can stike back at the attacker With a single melee swing or prepaired spell.

variants.name: Roaring
entries: Advantage on initiative. Once per round, reduce damage from a nonmagical ranged attack dealing 10 or less to 0 and ricochet it back for the same damage.

variants.name: Shield Wall
entries: Action: plant the shield to create a stationary opaque wall of force (ten 10-ft panels or a 10-ft-radius dome). AC 17, 25 HP per panel; blocks line of effect/movement (not teleportation). Lasts 1 minute or until retrieved. 1/day.

variants.name: Speed
entries: 2 /day as a Bonus Action, gain 1 round of *haste* that last until the end of your next turn.

variants.name: Styptic
entries: Bleed/ongoing blood loss ends; you stabilize automatically at 0 HP; ongoing wound effects like Sword of Wounding don’t function on you.

variants.name: Time Buttress
entries: Action: invulnerable to all damage/effects (harmful and helpful) until end of your next turn. 1/day.

variants.name: Vanishing
entries: Bonus or reaction: you and gear become invisible and soundless; undetectable by nonmagical senses until the end of your next turn. 2/day.

variants.name: Woodwalk
entries: In a wooded area, Action to cast *tree stride* Teleport between trees, Within eyesite.(1 round). 3/day.
